title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: The classic chewy chocolate chip cookie recipe.

title: Sushi
summary: A Japanese dish of vinegared rice combined with various ingredients, such as seafood, vegetables, and sometimes fruits.

title: Pizza
summary: A savory dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flattened base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients (such as anchovies, mushrooms, onions, olives, pineapple, meat, etc.), which is then baked at a high temperature, traditionally in a wood-fired oven.
